author: newsr.in
title: Anushka Sharma again targetted on Twitter for Virat Kohli's dismissal in 5th ODI
text: Mumbai, Oct 25: Bollywood actress Anushka Sharma once again faced ire of some insensitive cricket fans on micro-blogging website Twitter. After her cricketer boy friend Virat Kohli failed to perform in the 5th and final ODI at Wankhede Stadium on Sunday, Â»
